edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.rdf

Class RdfUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.rdf.RdfUtilities

  • public class RdfUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class with common operations on graphs and datasets
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

      • nStringToString

        public static java.lang.String nStringToString(java.lang.String nString)
        Converts nString to string. nStrings come from the RDF Store and include enclosing characters like quotes(<,>) and quotes ("). This enclosing characters will be removed.
        Parameters:
        nString - the nString
        Returns:
        the stripped string

      • getSubDataset

        public static org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset getSubDataset(org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset dataset,
                                                               org.apache.commons.rdf.api.RDF rdf,
                                                               org.apache.commons.rdf.api.BlankNodeOrIRI rootIri)
        Get the whole subgraph denoted by the given root as a new dataset
        Parameters:
        dataset - dataset to extract the data from
        rdf - the rdf Backend to be used
        rootIri - the IRI of the root of the subGraph to extract
        Returns:
        a Dataset With only the Graph of the rootIRI included.
